params._balanceThreshold: balance threshold of SYA tokens which actives feeless swapping
params._oneInch: address of 1inch contract to forward swaps
params._referralRegistry: address of referral registry that stores referral anchors
params._referralRewardRate: percentage of swapFee that are paid out as rewards
params._zeroEx: address of zeroX proxy contract to forward swaps

getUserFee(address).details: returns the fee nominator for a given user

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: lets the admin pause this contract

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.referee: address of referee for msg.sender, 0x adress if none
